About Resume Projects

Projects

  • Heroku
  • GitHub

    • Description

    browsin' provides users with an efficient way to search streaming movies and shows based on their subscriptions to Netflix, Hulu Plus and HBO Go. Results are sorted by ratings collected from IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes, allowing users to immediately discover the highest-rated content available to them.

    Technologies

    Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Nokogiri, JavaScript, Guidebox API, OMDB API

    Contributions

    As the team lead, I was responsible for organizing the stand ups and assigning coding tasks. I built the API parsers and a website scraper to collect data regarding movies and shows available through Netflix, Hulu and HBO Go, as well as reviews available through IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes.


  • Heroku
  • GitHub

    • Description

    Jam Session is a social networking app that allows musicians to find other musicians in Chicago to jam with.

    Technologies

    Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, HTML and CSS

    Contributions

    I created the models and migrations for tracking musicians by skill level, neighborhood and instrument. I also created and built the design for the musician profile pages.

    built with jekyll using scribble theme
